configuration.name: widget_0373112573600334
configuration.stem: What happens as energy from the sun warms Earth unevenly? Arrange the events in the order of occurrence.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about the cause and effect relationships between each event.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Global wind patterns are the result of air pressure differences across latitudes caused by differences in temperatures.

options.ddoText: Air pressure differences form across latitudes.
